name: lancashire
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a county (= an area with its own local government) in northwestern England: Knowles is the younger son of a Lancashire mill owner. A man with a Lancashire accent served her.
More examplesFewer examplesShe lives in a terraced house in Lancashire.He sent his son to the expensive Jesuit college of Stonyhurst in Lancashire. Anderson, known for his choirboy voice, was born in Lancashire, England, in 1944.
